ComicInfo.Summary:
Worm Food: A man breaks into a house to get some food and ends up with more than he bargained for.
Empathogen: An assistant repays his boss by taking credit for his latest invention.
The Secret of Bob's Success: Bob makes tons of money due to extra terrestrial interference. What price will he pay?
Vengeance: A postal worker goes postal
The Head of Hogarthsburg!: A phony faith healer becomes the new spiritual head of a remote small town.
Vegetarian Burger: A man takes his girlfriend on a date and gives her something extra to chew on.
